Posts.EditableText: I write my codes on School Computers... is there a zip portable version that is available for me to use and put on a Flash Drive?
Posts.HTML: I write my codes on School Computers... is there a zip portable version that is available for me to use and put on a Flash Drive?

Posts.EditableText: You could in theory just install Squiffy on a flash drive and then you could take it with you wherever you go.
Posts.HTML: You could in theory just install Squiffy on a flash drive and then you could take it with you wherever you go.
